sentence.Network_en: Or retouch over solid edges with the Retouch brush.
sentence.Network_cn: 或者用修饰刷通过修饰固体边缘.

sentence.Network_en: Retouch is made to the goods the cases of which get wet by the tidal water.
sentence.Network_cn: 被潮水浸湿的箱子中的货物正在进行整修.

PerfectNetExp.abs: GRE太傻笔记（下） ... retinue 侍从，随员 retouch 润饰,修正 revue 时事讽刺剧.
现在要做最后的修饰（retouching）。注意到小男孩嘴边有抓伤，可能是他自己用指甲括到的，用 ctrl + +或工具列的「缩放显示工具 …
GRE词汇精选（核心词汇） ... retort 反驳 retouch 修描；润色 retrace 回顾，追想.
retortion 扭回retouch 修饰；手修retrace characteristic 回描特性

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 17th cent.: probably from French retoucher

entry.tran: 润色，润饰，修饰(图画、照片等)
entry.def: If someone retouches something such as a picture or a photograph, they improve it, for example by painting over parts of it.

example.ex: He said the photographs had been retouched...
example.tran: 他说这些照片已经修饰过。
她修饰了一下自己的妆容。

means.word_mean: 2. alter so as to produce a more desirable appearance;

auth_sentence.content: We don't retouch our pictures to make patients look more sickly.
auth_sentence.res_content: We don't retouch our pictures to make patients look more sickly.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We don't retouch our pictures to make patients look more sickly.

stems_affixes.word_buile: touch摸,碰+able能……的→adj.可触的, 可食用的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 禁止触摸的,管不着的,独特的,不可及的
stems_affixes.word_buile: un不+touchable[adj.可触的, 可食用的]→不可触摸的
re重新+touch摸,碰→重新用[画笔等]接触画面→润色
